build.script:
#!/bin/sh
if ! command -v node -v &> /dev/null
then
	echo "node not found! install node -> https://nodejs.org/en/"
	exit 1
fi

if ! command -v yarn -v &> /dev/null
then
	echo "yarn not found! install yarn -> https://classic.yarnpkg.com/en/docs/install/#mac-stable"
	exit 1
fi
yarn install
